entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Drizzle, 9.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 2:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Drizzle
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 8.2°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
